com.ihordev.core.navigation

Class RequestMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihordev.core.navigation.RequestMapping

  • @Component
public class RequestMapping
extends Object

    A class for matching http requests with application request mapping. It wraps a RequestMappingHandlerMapping instance and uses its AbstractHandlerMapping.getHandler(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest) method for triggering request matching and HandlerMapping.URI_TEMPLATE_VARIABLES_ATTRIBUTE and HandlerMapping.BEST_MATCHING_PATTERN_ATTRIBUTE for obtaining information about match.

      • matchRequest

        public RequestMatchingResult matchRequest(HttpServletRequest request)
        Tries to match http request with application request mapping and returns result in RequestMatchingResult instance.
        Parameters:
        request - the http request for which matching must be performed
        Returns:
        the instance of RequestMatchingResult containing information about matching
